# reloadSections(withIdentifiers:)

**Instance Method**

Reloads the data within the specified sections of the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func reloadSections(withIdentifiers sectionIdentifiers: [Any])
```

## Parameters

- **sectionIdentifiers**: The array of identifiers corresponding to the sections to reload in the snapshot.

## Reloading data

- **reloadItems(withIdentifiers:)**: Reloads the data within the specified items in the snapshot.

items.description: Reloads the data within the specified items in the snapshot.
items.name: reloadItems(withIdentifiers:)
